description: Union of Fibonacci numbers and prime numbers.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
mathematica: Module[{nn=15,fib},fib=Fibonacci[Range[nn]];Union[Join[fib, Prime[ Range[ PrimePi[ Last[fib]]]]]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 21 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) { p=2; f=1; g=1; for (n=1, 1000, if (f<p, a=f; s=f; f+=g; g=s, a=p; q=p; p=nextprime(p + 1); if (q==f, s=f; f+=g; g=s); ); write("b060634.txt", n, " ", a); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 08 2009]
author: Jose' R. Brox (ambroxius2(AT)eresmas.com), Apr 15 2001
